para.text: All-in-One design, Integrated IEC61850 SMV (Complied IEC61850-9-1, IEC61850-9-2, IEC61850-9-2LE) & GOOSE, up to 6 currents and 7 Voltages analog channels output, Inbuilt GPS and IRIG-B, and other advance functions.
